## NotificationsService class

Notifications service used for creating notifications

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class NotificationsService 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [clearingMessages](./notifications.notificationsservice.clearingmessages.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;void&gt;</code> | Gets observable that is used for indication that messages are being cleared |
|  [notifying](./notifications.notificationsservice.notifying.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;Notification&gt;</code> | Gets observable that is used for notifying user |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clearMessages()](./notifications.notificationsservice.clearmessages.md) |  | Clears all displayed messages for current services |
|  [error(message)](./notifications.notificationsservice.error.md) |  | Displays error notification |
|  [info(message)](./notifications.notificationsservice.info.md) |  | Displays info notification |
|  [success(message)](./notifications.notificationsservice.success.md) |  | Displays success notification |
